message.name: ERR_FV_CONCERNROLE_MANDATORY
message.locale: The client's concern role must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_CASE_PARTICIPANT_ROLE_TYPE_MANDATORY
message.locale: The client's case participant role type must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_WM_AUTHORISATION_INSTANCE_DATA_MANDATORY
message.locale: The authorization data instance must be specified.
The authorisation data instance must be specified.
